Entries.Thu2: Mister Peter is teaching me how to write in cursive.$h#$e#He has such pretty handwriting.

Entries.eventSeen_3102768: Peter's a sweet guy. He's been Vincent's teacher for a while now, and he really loves him.

Entries.Tue: Mister Peter is doing his best to get me up to speed in my schooling. He's really nice...#$e#...Luckily, I remember some things from my old, old life... before washing up on the island... so it's not as difficult as it could be.#$e#Mister Peter says he's impressed with how much I know!
Entries.Wed: Between Linus and Mister Peter, I'm going to learn everything there is to learn!$h#$e#Mayor Lewis says I'm on the fast track to becoming a 'well-rounded citizen'... whatever that means.

Entries.pamHouseUpgrade: @, I heard what you did for Pam and Peter... now *that's* the kind of community support I love to see in Pelican Town!$h
Entries.pamHouseUpgradeAnonymous: @, did you hear? Someone paid Robin to build Pam and Peter a house! Robin won't tell me who it was, though.#$e#Regardless of who paid, I love seeing this kind of community support in Pelican Town!$h

Entries.Rainy_Day_0: I wonder how Peter is doing? Maybe I'll give him a call later today.

Entries.Rainy_Night_1: I'm sure Mom's at the saloon right now... But I don't feel so bad about it anymore. It's out of my hands.
Entries.Indoor_Night_1: Hmm... shorts or pants tomorrow? Oh, who am I kidding... I always go with pants.
Entries.Indoor_Night_3: Mom's probably pretty lonely now that I'm gone. I just hope she doesn't visit the saloon more to make up for it.#$e#You shouldn't feel bad! Mom has to solve her own problems.
Entries.Good_2: I knew you were the one from the moment you moved here...$l
Entries.winter_6: The falling snow reminds me of grandma, rocking by the fire. I have this vivid memory of her shadow, flickering against the orange wood... That was long ago.

Entries.married_Penny: Hey, congratulations!$h#$b#I remember the first time Peter told me he had feelings for you...#$b#He was all shy about it, but I knew right away it was serious... he wouldn't say something like that if he didn't mean it!
Entries.summer_Wed4: Peter and I have been doing a seasonal book club.#$b#It's just the two of us, but it's still fun to discuss what we're reading!

Entries.married_Penny: I'll really miss that boy...$s#$b#You treat my Peter good, now. You hear me?$u
Entries.divorced_Penny: Peter came home crying... what'd you do to him?$3
Entries.Trailer_Entry: Peter! Did you make dinner?/Peter! You done your chores?/Peter! You home?/Hey! I'm home!
Entries.Thu: #$1 PamDrunk#Blahh... I had one too many caramel porters at the saloon last night... Go away.$k#$e#My house ain't pretty but at least it's by the river.#$e#Hey. Peter's my baby boy. Be nice to him or leave him alone, got it?
Entries.Thu4: Peter says I spend too much time at the saloon...$s
Entries.fall_Thu: Peter's the only one I've got, so you best treat him kindly.
Entries.winter_Tue4: I just hope Peter has a good life ahead of him. If you ever have kids you'll know how I feel.#$e#...It's so dry in winter. My skin feels like old parchment.
Entries.winter_Tue4_inlaw_Penny: Hey. You better be treatin' Peter right on that old farm of yours. He's the only one I got!
Entries.winter_Fri: Peter sure does like old books. I think he's a heck of a lot smarter than I ever was.#$e#I'm glad.
Entries.summer_Fri: ...Yeah?#$e#You're a fine lookin' young man. Why're you wastin' your time talkin' to an old guy like me?^You're a pretty gal. What're you wastin' your time talkin' to someone like me for?

Entries.Mon4: *sigh*... My mother definitely has a problem with going to the saloon too much.$s#$q 7/8 Mon_old#But it's best not to dwell on bad things, right?#$r 7 50 Mon_7#Right. It's best to be positive!#$r 8 10 Mon_8#I think it's good to be realistic.
Entries.Mon8: I'm eager to move out. It's such a burden to be worrying about Mom all the time.#$e#I want her to be happy, but I can't stay here forever... you know?$s
Entries.Tue4: $d bus#Maybe now that my mother has her bus driving job back, I can start saving more money. Things are looking a little brighter.|I'm trying to save money from my tutoring job, but it's hard with my mother out of work.$s
Entries.Fri4: Dishes, dishes, dishes. Ugh... If my mother wasn't always nursing a headache from her late nights at the saloon, maybe she could help around the house a little.$s
Entries.Sat2: $d Joja#Things changed a lot after the JojaMart went up. It's been really bad for Pierre's shop. Mom loves JojaMart, though. The prices are cheap, so she can afford a lot more there than she ever could at Pierre's.|Mom's been complaining ever since JojaMart closed down. I think it's good for her, though. Maybe she'll drink less Joja Cola now.
Entries.summer_Fri: $d bus#I heard you were responsible for fixing the bus back up. Thank you.|My mother used to drive the bus to Calico Desert... but the bus stopped working a few years ago. Mayor says there's not enough money in the town coffers, or else he'd have it fixed.$u
Entries.fall_Thu6: Mom doesn't take very good care of herself...$u#$e#I worry about her.$u
Entries.fall_Fri6: When I was a little kid, my father abandoned us because he said he felt 'trapped'. We haven't seen him since.$s#$b#I'm sorry to make things uncomfortable for you... It's just that this time of year makes me think of it for some reason.$u#$e#Anyway... How's the farming life going?

Entries.pamHouseUpgrade: Our little plan worked out well, don't you think? Pam and Peter seem really happy.
Entries.pamHouseUpgradeAnonymous: Our little plan worked out well, don't you think? Pam and Peter seem really happy.

Entries.Tue6: Can you keep a secret, mister?^Can you keep a secret, miss?$u#$b#I wanna marry Mister Peter when I grow up.#$e#Just don't tell him, okay?$u
Entries.Sat: Mister Penny makes me read a new book every week.$s#$b#At least he lets me pick them, sometimes!

Entries.AcceptGift_(O)SkillBook_1: Ah, 'Bait And Bobber'... Every angler ought to have a subscription, but it costs a pretty penny. Taught me a lot of good fishin' tips over the years. Thanks!$h

Entries.pennySpa: Meet me in the bath house after dark. ^   -Peter[#]Peter's Note

Entries.vincent_read_right: Mr. Peter says I have to read this book before I can go play.$s

Entries.Penny_spring_movie_0_DuringMovie_2: Peter seems to be holding back some tears...

Entries.BathHouse_WomensLocker.2: It's Peter's locker. There's a frilly bathing suit inside.
Entries.SamHouse.10: --Report Card--^Name: Vincent^^Reading: C^Spelling: D^Math: C^Social Studies: B-^Art: B-^Sports:A^^Note:Vince is a good boy, but he could make do with a little more studying!^  -Peter

Entries.PennysFryer_Description: Peter's favorite frying pan. There's some rubbery gunk stuck to the inside.

Okay everyone!"/faceDirection Sebastian 3 true/faceDirection Emily 1/faceDirection Demetrius 1 true/faceDirection Elliott 0/faceDirection Pierre 0 true/faceDirection Caroline 0 true/faceDirection Shane 3/faceDirection Sam 3 true/faceDirection Abigail 3/speak Leah "Thanks for coming to my art show.$l"/faceDirection Leah 1/speak Leah "As some of you know, I came to this town because I wanted to draw inspiration from the beautiful surroundings."/faceDirection Leah 3/speak Leah "This place really feels like home now.$h#$b#Okay. I'm going to introduce my sculptures now."/playMusic jaunty/move Leah -3 0 0/faceDirection farmer 3 true/faceDirection Marnie 3 true/faceDirection Linus 0 true/faceDirection Emily 3 true/faceDirection Demetrius 0/move Leah 0 -1 0/speak Leah "I haven't named this one, yet. She started out as an exercise in human anatomy, but I ended up seeing her through to completion.#$b#Her expression is intentionally unclear... is she embarrassed, amused, pained? I'll leave that for you to decide."/pause 1500/move Leah 0 1 2/faceDirection Demetrius 2 true/faceDirection Haley 2 true/faceDirection farmer 2/faceDirection Emily 2 true/faceDirection Clint 2 true/pause 500/speak Leah "This one's called 'Post-Dimensional Nullspace'. It represents the boundary of human imagination.$u#$b#The shape and color came to me vividly when I was in a 'trance state'."/pause 1500/move Leah 3 0 2/faceDirection Linus 1 true/faceDirection Demetrius 1 true/move Leah 0 1 1/faceDirection Haley 1/speak Leah "I've been calling this one 'Egg Heads'. I wanted to create an animatronic humanoid statue to toy with the viewer's ability to properly attribute personhood to a physical entity. "/pause 1500/move Leah 0 -1 0/pause 300/faceDirection Leah 2/speak Leah "And the last one is called 'Wood Sculpture 3'. It's a celebration of my favorite sculpting material... wood."/faceDirection Leah 3/faceDirection Leah 1/faceDirection Leah 2/speak Leah "Well, those are my sculptures!$l#$b#Oh! One last thing."/faceDirection Leah 0/speak Leah "I'd like to say thanks to my special friend, @.#$b#He gave me the idea for this show and the courage to go through with it. I know that sounds cheesy, but it's true.^She gave me the idea for this show and the courage to go through with it. I know that sounds cheesy, but it's true."/faceDirection Emily 1/faceDirection Shane 3 true/faceDirection Haley 1/faceDirection Elliott 3/pause 400/speak Lewis "I'm proud of you, Leah! 'Post-Dimensional Nullspace' is my favorite.$h"/textAboveHead Robin "Great use of wood!"/speak Penny "Thanks for doing this!$h"/faceDirection Leah 1/emote Leah 32/faceDirection Leah 2/speak Leah "Thanks, everyone!$h"/faceDirection Leah 0/emote Leah 20/pause 500/speak Lewis "Now let's start the bidding on these wonderful art pieces... I'm exhausted.#$b#My show was a real success, wasn't it?$h"
